description: The extremeStackMemberOverheat notification is generated
when the temperature of the stack member reaches the
threshold temperature

event.Summary: Temperature ($v3° C) is above overheat threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackMemberOverheat RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime t 31536000 RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr s EXAMPLE EXTREME-SYSTEM-MIB::extremeCurrentTemperature i 0 EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackMemberSlotId i 1

description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the
network management portion of the system was last
re-initialized.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysUpTime

description: A textual description of the entity. This value
should include the full name and version
identification of the system's hardware type
software operating-system, and networking
software. It is mandatory that this only contain
printable ASCII characters.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr

description: Current temperature in degrees celcius measured inside
device enclosure.
variables.name: EXTREME-SYSTEM-MIB::extremeCurrentTemperature

description: The slot id of the stack member in the stack
variables.name: EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackMemberSlotId

description: The extremeStackMemberStatusChanged notification is
generated when the operational status of the stack member
changes
The slot id of the stack member in the stack
variables.name: EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackMemberSlotId

description: The operational status of the stack member. When the stack
comes up, if there is a vector mismatch namely license mismatch or
platform mismatch between the master and the member, the member
remains in the mismatch state. Further communication with the member
is not possible
variables.name: EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackMemberOperStatus

description: The extremeStackingPortStatusChanged notification is
generated when the operational status of the stacking port
changes
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackingPortStatusChanged RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackingPortRemoteMac s EXAMPL EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackingPortLinkSpeed u 9999 EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackingPortLinkStatus i 1

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: The Mac address of the remote system, this stacking port
is connected to. The value of the mac address will be 00:00:00:00:00:00
if the stacking link is not active.
variables.name: EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackingPortRemoteMac

description: The Speed of the stacking port link in bps. The speed will be
zero if the link is not up
variables.name: EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackingPortLinkSpeed

description: The Link status of the stacking port link
variables.name: EXTREME-STACKING-MIB::extremeStackingPortLinkStatus
